nodes.description: 2023年某日深夜，塔利班在阿富汗 Laghman Province Alishing 区的军事车队和检查站发动袭击
nodes.support_text: Taliban attacked a security checkpoint in Alishing district and clashed with security forces, the MoD said.

nodes.description: 阿富汗国防部于次日（星期一）宣布击退袭击，称塔利班遭受重大伤亡
nodes.support_text: the attack happened on Sunday night, said the MoD in a statement on Monday.

nodes.description: 阿富汗省级议会成员 Gulzar Sangarwal Neyazi 披露至少 22 名安全部队成员死亡，多辆军车损毁
nodes.support_text: Gulzar Sangarwal Neyazi, a member of the provincial council, said that at least 22 Afghan security forces were killed in the attack.

nodes.description: 塔利班宣称共击毙 24 名士兵并摧毁 13 辆军车，为袭击负责
nodes.support_text: the Taliban claimed responsibility for the attack and said they killed 24 soldiers and destroyed 13 military tanks.

nodes.description: 阿富汗省级议会成员Gulzar Sangarwal Neyazi向TOLOnews透露伤亡细节
